title: Desert farming
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Agriculture - Environmental aspects

Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Soil conservation
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Agriculture - Environmental aspects

Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Land use - Remote areas

description: Describes the conservation approaches and the modern technology used by scientists to convert deserts into blooming farmlands; how we have learned to bring water for irrigation, leech the soil of unwanted chemicals, and provide proper drainage. Shows machinery used, crops grown, harvesting and packaging.
